div.p:
Vision Academy is ranked 203-311st within Louisiana.
The total minority enrollment is 98%, and
100% of students are economically disadvantaged.
Vision Academy is the only high school
in the Vision Academy.

div.class: p2 border flex mb6 ProductPromo__Container-s1klhn2z-0 jhjjim

div.h3: Operating status for schools in Louisiana
div.p: Schools in Louisiana have been ordered closed through 4/30/2020, which went into effect on 3/16/20. There are 1,404 K-12 public schools in Louisiana with 716,293 students enrolled.
div.a: For more information from Education Week, see Map: Coronavirus and School Closures

section.p: Vision Academy is ranked #13,345-17,792 in the National Rankings. Schools are ranked on their performance on state-required tests, graduation and how well they prepare students for college. Read more about how we rank the Best High Schools.

div.data-tracking-campaign: High School Graduation Rates By State

h3.a: High School Graduation Rates By State

div.div: Iowa, Kentucky and North Dakota have the highest high school graduation rates in the country.
The 100 highest-ranked high schools are spread across 29 states.

div.data-tracking-campaign: Metro Areas With Top-Ranked High Schools

h3.a: Metro Areas With Top-Ranked High Schools

div.div: These metro areas, scattered throughout the country, boast the best public high schools in the U.S.

div.data-tracking-campaign: Where the Best Public High Schools Are

h3.a: Where the Best Public High Schools Are

div.div: The suburbs are home to many top high schools, representing 45% of those in the top 25th percentile.

div.data-tracking-campaign: U.S. News Ranks 2020 Best High Schools

h3.a: U.S. News Ranks 2020 Best High Schools

div.div: The top-ranked public high schools around the country include a mix of traditional, charter and magnet schools.

div.div: Learn about the top-ranked high schools in the country.

div.data-tracking-campaign: Find Help From a High School Counselor

h3.a: Find Help From a High School Counselor

div.div: Students struggling academically or with personal issues can seek help from a high school counselor.

div.data-tracking-campaign: Facts About High School JROTC Programs

h3.a: Facts About High School JROTC Programs

div.div: JROTC programs can teach students a broad range of life skills for success after high school.
The AVID program focuses on college readiness to help students be successful after high school.
International Baccalaureate and Advanced Placement courses offer similar educational benefits to students, but in different ways.
